title: Palestine Action activists cleared of aggravated burglary at Israeli defence firm site
desc: None of the six activists were convicted of any offence over break-in at Elbit Systems factory near Bristol in 2024

title: Lakemba Mosque receives second 'threatening letter' weeks out from Ramadan
desc: It is the second such incident in the past fortnight after police charged a 70-year-old man with allegedly sending a threatening letter to Lakemba Mosque in late January.

title: Crown of Blood review - Macbeth’s deadly hurly-burly rooted in mythic Yoruba landscape

title: Watch dead neutron stars smash together in new NASA supercomputer simulation
desc: Using a NASA supercomputer, scientists have discovered that things get messy when the universe's most extreme dead stars, neutron stars, meet.

title: Most of repair work complete, Metrolinx says
desc: Metrolinx says most of the necessary GO train track repairs are complete after a derailment on Monday caused serious transit disruptions for commuters — but service impacts will likely continue to be felt on Thursday.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: USA's speed skating star Casey Dawson takes "unfinished business" to Milano Cortina
desc: The 25-year old is looking to put the disappointment of Beijing 2022 behind him as he chases individual glory in Italy: "I’m in the best shape that I have ever been."

title: Tech Giants Tumble Anew in Momentum-Trade Unwind: Markets Wrap
desc: (Bloomberg) -- Wall Street traders kept driving a rotation out of tech giants, whose all-weather earnings made them safe bets at times of economic uncertainty, and into a broader category of firms tuned to improving growth prospects. Bitcoin sank.
